verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's time for the babes to be children,
Time for the children to be sons,
Time for the sons to be fathers,
Time for God's people to be one;

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It's time for the fearful to take courage,
Time for the weak to be strong,
It's time for God's people to gather,
And it's time for the ark to move on.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, brethren, these are perilous times,
As the Lord by His servants has warned,
But what be our answer if we turn aside,
Nay, but we shall arise and press on.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
It's time for the manchild to be born,
It's time for the trumpet to sound,
Death still must be beaten,
The time, fellow soldiers, is now.
